main event: On 25 March 1953, a woman in Panama City observed a circular unidentified flying object that was shiny in color and moved at high speeds.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3 seconds., The object was observed from inside her house through a window., The object appeared circular and shinier than a star., There were at least 30 jet aircraft in the vicinity at the time of the sighting., The observer did not have a clear view of the objectâ€™s distance or altitude.
sighted object: one circular and shiny unidentified flying object
witness description: a woman observing from inside her house
